name: get_collective_info
description: Get detailed information about a collective.

name: get_members
description: Returns all members of the collective (core contributors, contributors, backers, sponsors).

memberType.desciption: Filter by member type. Available option: all(default), users, organizations.

limit.desciption: Number of members to return per call.

offset.desciption: Number of members to skip (for pagination).

name: get_members_per_tier
description: Returns all members of a specific tier of the collective.

memberType.desciption: Filter by member type. Available option: all(default), users, organizations.

limit.desciption: Number of members to return per call.

offset.desciption: Number of members to skip (for pagination).

name: get_transactions
description: Return All Transactions of a collective given its slug.

api_key.desciption: Your API Key. For more detials on how to have an Api Key, you need to get in touch with Open Collective.

limit.desciption: Number of members to return per call.

offset.desciption: Number of members to skip (for pagination).

type.desciption: Filter transactions of type DEBIT or CREDIT.

dateFrom.desciption: The end date (format YYYY-MM-DD) to be considered when returning the data.

includeVirtualCards.desciption: A boolean that, if true, will include the transactions generated by all virtual cards issued by the specified collective. The default value is False.

name: list_events
description: List events of a collective given its slug.

limit.desciption: Number of members to return per call.

offset.desciption: Number of members to skip (for pagination).

name: get_event_info
description: Get detailed information about an event.

limit.desciption: Number of members to return per call.

offset.desciption: Number of members to skip (for pagination).

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
